


```
sed -i "s/^persistent_peers *=.*/persistent_peers = \"$PEERS\"/;" $HOME/.stride/config/config.toml
```
```
systemctl daemon-reload
```
```
systemctl restart strided
```

```
journalctl -fu strided -o cat
```
